sentences.english: In addition, the author conducts a textual research on the location of…
sentences.chinese: 文章还对《后汉书》所述“三危”的位置进行了考证。

sentences.english: It is an obvious cultural feature to emphasize the harmony between Heaven and Man in Han Shu.
sentences.chinese: 强调天人谐调构成了《汉书》的一大文化特色。

sentences.english: Studying the distinction between Shiji and Hanshu is a traditional academic subject.
sentences.chinese: 研究《史记》《汉书》之异同是一个传统学术课题。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, the author analyses the intended purpose in History of the Later Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三章对《后汉书》史论的精意深旨进行分析探讨。

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls
